item.title: latest nodejs for debian and derived distributions
item.author: Author
item.description: latest NODE installation in debian 1 2 3 4 $ echo 'deb https://deb.nodesource.com/node_12.x sid main' | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list > /dev/null $ sudo apt update $ sudo apt install -y nodejs Enjoy using NODEjs!
